vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.40
§ Machnadebai = "he brought low my willing ones"
one of the sons of Bani who put away his foreign wife at Ezra's command
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hombre; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪拿底拜 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他使我樂意的降卑"
巴尼的眾子之一, 因以斯拉的命令而和其外邦妻子離婚 (拉 10:40)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛拿底拜 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他使我乐意的降卑"
巴尼的众子之一, 因以斯拉的命令而和其外邦妻子离婚 (拉 10:40)
